Stereotype.name: ArchitecturalViewModel
Stereotype.notes: A XIS-Mobile's Architectural View Diagram represents the interactions between the mobile application and other external entities (such as, internal providers, mobile applications or remote servers).

Stereotype.name: BusinessEntitiesViewModel
Stereotype.notes: A XIS-Mobile's BusinessEntities View Diagram represents higher-level entities, known as business entities, that provide context to a certain use case and interaction spaces.

Stereotype.name: DomainViewModel
Stereotype.notes: A XIS-Mobile's Domain View Diagram represents the relevant classes to the problem domain, their attributes and the relationships among them.

Stereotype.name: InteractionSpaceViewModel
Stereotype.notes: A XIS-Mobile's InteractionSpace View represents each application's screen, known as interaction space, namely the UI layout, the events a certain UI component can trigger and the gestures that can be performed.

Stereotype.name: NavigationSpaceViewModel
Stereotype.notes: A XIS-Mobile's NavigationSpace View Diagram represents the navigation flow between the several interaction spaces with which the user interacts.

Stereotype.name: UseCasesViewModel
Stereotype.notes: A XIS-Mobile's UseCases View Diagram represents the operations a user can perform in the context of a business entity and/or a service.

Stereotype.name: XIS-MobileViewModel
Stereotype.notes: A XIS-Mobile Views Diagram represents the several views of a XIS-Mobile project.
